DOC.brief_summary: Purpose: To establish the prevalence of anticoagulant, aspirin, and clopidogrel use in patients undergoing vitreoretinal surgery, and to compare the outcome of peribulbar anesthesia between users and non-users.
DOC.brief_title: Anticoagulant and Antiplatelet Agents in Patients Undergoing Vitreoretinal Surgery
DOC.criteria: Take or no anticoagulant treatment before surgery, Vitreoretinal surgery none No surgery Anesthetic complication
